message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not comfortable with the price you mentioned. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $925000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $875000. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
I understand your position, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is as low as I can go, considering the value it holds for me.

I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $875000, and that's my final offer. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
I understand that you're firm on your price, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, and I'll sell it to you for $887500. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $882500, and that's my final offer. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
I understand that you're firm on your price, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, and I'll sell it to you for $885000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I've decided to stop negotiating and buy the product from John for $1200000.
